definitions.text: an appraisal of the state of affairs
examples: they made an assay of the contents
a check on its dependability under stress

definitions.text: a substance that is undergoing an analysis of its components
a written report of the results of an analysis of the composition of some substance

a quantitative or qualitative test of a substance (especially an ore or a drug) to determine its components; frequently used to test for the presence or concentration of infectious agents or antibodies etc.

examples: He tried to shake off his fears
The infant had essayed a few wobbly steps
The police attempted to stop the thief
She always seeks to do good in the world
